title: Smite bug: Not casting on Champions or Minions occasionally.
body: I use Smartcast on my Summoner spells and have been having a problem (Several times in different games) where Smite will not cast on Champions or Minions for several seconds, even while off Cooldown - anyone else been having problems?

replies.body: That could be a problem in that your cooldown timers are off, which would be the result of a local file being damaged. Have you tried repairing?

Tell me of the results of that.

Best of luck.
